languages.text: "Епископ Иеронимус направился туда, где чаще всего видят бунтарей, чтобы проповедовать им и склонить их к покаянию. Увы, он до сих пор не может узреть разницы между грешниками и непоправимыми сквернавцами".

"Reverend Hieronymus headed where the rebels are seen most often, so he could preach to them and sway them to repent. Alas, he still cannot see the difference between those who have erred and those who are beyond any hope of redemption."
languages.original_text: "Епископ Иеронимус направился туда, где чаще всего видят бунтарей, чтобы проповедовать им и склонить их к покаянию. Увы, он до сих пор не может узреть разницы между грешниками и непоправимыми сквернавцами".

traits.locale_text: "Reverend Hieronymus headed where the rebels are seen the most often so he could preach to them and sway them to repent. Alas, he still cannot see the difference between whose who have erred and those who are beyond any hope of redemption."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “希罗尼穆斯牧师去了叛乱分子最常出没的地方，想要向他们传教，说服他们悔改。遗憾的是，犯了错的人和无药可救的人是有区别的，但他却没有看到这两者之间的区别。”
languages.original_text: "Reverend Hieronymus headed where the rebels are seen most often, so he could preach to them and sway them to repent. Alas, he still cannot see the difference between those who have erred and those who are beyond any hope of redemption."

traits.locale_text: “希罗尼穆斯牧师去了叛乱分子最常出没的地方，想要向他们传教，说服他们悔改。遗憾的是，犯了错的人和无药可救的人是有区别的，但他却没有看到这两者之间的区别。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「ヒエロニムス司祭は、反逆者が最も頻繁に目撃された場所に向かった。教えを説き、悔い改めるよう説得するつもりで。だが、彼は未だに単なる過ちを犯した者と、贖罪の望みのない者の違いが分からない様だ」
languages.original_text: "Reverend Hieronymus headed where the rebels are seen most often, so he could preach to them and sway them to repent. Alas, he still cannot see the difference between those who have erred and those who are beyond any hope of redemption."

traits.locale_text: 「ヒエロニムス司祭は、反逆者が最も頻繁に目撃された場所に向かった。教えを説き、悔い改めるよう説得するつもりで。だが、彼は未だに単なる過ちを犯した者と、贖罪の望みのない者の違いが分からない様だ」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «El reverendo Hieronymus se dirigió a los lugares donde más a menudo se ve a los rebeldes para predicar y convencerles de que se arrepintieran. Por desgracia, todavía no puede ver la diferencia entre los que han errado y los que están más alejados de cualquier esperanza de redención».
languages.original_text: "Reverend Hieronymus headed where the rebels are seen most often, so he could preach to them and sway them to repent. Alas, he still cannot see the difference between those who have erred and those who are beyond any hope of redemption."

traits.locale_text: «El reverendo Hieronymus se dirigió a los lugares donde más a menudo se ve a los rebeldes para predicar y convencerles de que se arrepintieran. Por desgracia, todavía no puede ver la diferencia entre los que han errado y los que están más alejados de cualquier esperanza de redención».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Reverend Hieronymus ist dorthin gegangen, wo die Rebellen am öftesten gesehen werden, um vor ihnen zu predigen und sie dazu zu bewegen, Buße zu tun. Leider sieht er noch immer nicht den Unterschied zwischen denen, die einen Fehler begangen haben, und denen, die unwiderruflich verloren sind."
languages.original_text: "Reverend Hieronymus headed where the rebels are seen most often, so he could preach to them and sway them to repent. Alas, he still cannot see the difference between those who have erred and those who are beyond any hope of redemption."

traits.locale_text: "Reverend Hieronymus ist dorthin gegangen, wo die Rebellen am öftesten gesehen werden, um vor ihnen zu predigen und sie dazu zu bewegen, Buße zu tun. Leider sieht er noch immer nicht den Unterschied zwischen denen, die einen Fehler begangen haben, und denen, die unwiderruflich verloren sind."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Le révérend s'est rendu là où l'on voit le plus souvent les rebelles, afin de les sermonner et d'essayer de les pousser à se repentir. Hélas, il ne voit toujours pas la différence entre les brebis égarées et les irrécupérables. »
languages.original_text: "Reverend Hieronymus headed where the rebels are seen most often, so he could preach to them and sway them to repent. Alas, he still cannot see the difference between those who have erred and those who are beyond any hope of redemption."

traits.locale_text: « Le révérend s'est rendu là où l'on voit le plus souvent les rebelles, afin de les sermonner et d'essayer de les pousser à se repentir. Hélas, il ne voit toujours pas la différence entre les brebis égarées et les irrécupérables. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Muhterem Hieronymus, isyancıların en çok görüldüğü yere gitti ki onlara vaaz verebilsin ve onları tövbe yoluna döndürebilsin. Ancak ne yazık ki yanlışlıkla hataya düşenler ile kurtuluş umudu olmayanlar arasındaki farkı hâlâ göremiyor."
languages.original_text: "Reverend Hieronymus headed where the rebels are seen most often, so he could preach to them and sway them to repent. Alas, he still cannot see the difference between those who have erred and those who are beyond any hope of redemption."

traits.locale_text: "Muhterem Hieronymus, isyancıların en çok görüldüğü yere gitti ki onlara vaaz verebilsin ve onları tövbe yoluna döndürebilsin. Ancak ne yazık ki yanlışlıkla hataya düşenler ile kurtuluş umudu olmayanlar arasındaki farkı hâlâ göremiyor."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
